summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of 4 new features: Analytics Dashboard, Risk Management Dashboard, Strategy Builder, and header buttons. All features working correctly with proper UI components, data display, and user interactions.
passed_tests: Analytics button (purple) opens Analytics modal
Analytics modal shows Trade Journal & Analytics title
Analytics period selector works (7 Days, 30 Days, 90 Days, All Time buttons)
Analytics shows Win Rate metric (9.1% with 1W/10L)
Analytics shows Total P/L metric ($-7,283.94)
Analytics shows Avg P/L metric ($-662.18)
Analytics shows Profit Factor metric (0.01)
Analytics shows Best Trade metric ($92.00)
Analytics shows Worst Trade metric ($-3,445.98)
Analytics Win/Loss Distribution pie chart section present
Analytics P/L by Strategy Type bar chart displays data
Analytics Monthly Performance chart displays data
Analytics P/L by Holding Period chart displays data
Risk button (blue) opens Risk Management modal
Risk Dashboard shows Trading Capital input field (default $100,000)
Risk Dashboard Trading Capital input is configurable
Risk metrics display: Capital at Risk ($3,670 / 7.3%)
Risk metrics display: Max Potential Loss ($3,670)
Risk metrics display: Margin Utilization (7.3%)
Risk metrics display: Available Capital ($46,330 / 92.7%)
Risk alerts display when concentration is high (^SPX concentration: 100.0%)
Risk by Symbol pie chart displays (^SPX 100%)
Risk by Strategy pie chart displays (Iron Condor 100%)
Expiration Timeline bar chart displays
Capital Utilization progress bar displays
Builder button (amber) opens Strategy Builder modal
Quick Add dropdown shows 5 common strategies
Quick Add: Bull Put Spread option available
Quick Add: Bear Call Spread option available
Quick Add: Iron Condor option available
Quick Add: Straddle option available
Quick Add: Strangle option available
Selecting Iron Condor template creates 4 correct legs
Strategy Name auto-populates (Iron Condor 6970/6975/6985/6990)
P/L at Expiration chart updates when legs are added
Max Profit calculates correctly ($172)
Max Loss calculates correctly ($-328)
Breakevens calculate correctly ($6973, $6987)
Paper Trade button is enabled when legs and name are set
Strategy Summary shows correct type, expiration, net premium, symbol
seed_data_creation: None - used existing portfolio positions for analytics/risk data
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 4 new features (Analytics, Risk Management, Strategy Builder, header buttons) are fully functional. Analytics shows historical trade data with charts. Risk Dashboard shows portfolio risk metrics with configurable trading capital. Strategy Builder allows creating multi-leg strategies with Quick Add templates and real-time P/L calculation. Existing portfolio has 1 Iron Condor position which is reflected in the risk metrics.
